name: claude-spec-first-workflow
description: A comprehensive Claude Code workflow for specification-first development with intelligent auto-configuration, dependency mapping, and rollback strategies
author: Specification-First Workflow Contributors

scripts.install-plugin: echo 'Copy .claude/workflows/spec-first to your project: cp -r .claude/workflows/spec-first YOUR_PROJECT/.claude/workflows/'
scripts.verify: test -f .claude/workflows/spec-first/manifest.json && echo 'Plugin structure verified ✅' || echo 'Error: Plugin structure invalid ❌'
